name: Specials 4
description:
Specials is an organic explorative connection and growth system, currently releasing its veins throughout the Tezos blockchain.
A name in a piece with a life of its own. And life… finds a way. In the cool mist of daybreak in the temperate forest, stood @VonDoyl, whose tendrils soon located @davidcheifetz, who then summoned @PasanenJenni, who has sensed her way through the elements to discover… 

This piece was created with someone specific in mind. The person named in Specials 4 was chosen by our dear friend @PasanenJenni. 

Specials contain the Twitter handle (mostly obscured) of an artist, collector, or friend. If all editions are collected, the name will be revealed on Twitter in a WIP pic. 

"The One" named in the piece gets two things:

1) An edition airdropped. If he/she has already collected one, they can choose to get the airdrop, or name someone else it should go to.

2) They nominate the name to be contained in the next piece.

One edition will be held aside for the first person to correctly guess who is named in the piece. If no guesses, the edition will become available. 
Please come say hello on Twitter for clues so you can make an educated guess and possibly grab one for free! @kellybrnz
